name: IB哲學與實作（IB）
comment: 另一位授課教師：范雅筑。
restrict: ◎第一階段限 國際教師學程-華語文 國際教師學程-數學 國際教師學程-物理 國際教師學程-國際◎限國際教師學程-華語文、國際教師學程-數學、國際教師學程-物理、國際教師學程-國際選修
goals: Know IB programme models, standards, and the curriculum coherence.
Demonstrate the competence in designing learning activities that are embedded with IB philosophy.
Be able to communicate and collaborate with peers within different teacher communities.
Appreciate how teaching and learning are done in IB schools and reflect to their own instruction.
Construct several unit plans which allow students to inquire knowledge independently.
syllabus:
1\. IB Philosophy and IB Mission

2\. Learner Profile and International Mindedness

3\. IB standards and Practices & Programme Models

4\. Conceptual Understanding and Contextual Learning

5\. Approaches to Learning & Approaches to Teaching

6\. Assessment Objectives and Criteria

7\. Formative Assessment and Inclusion

8-10. Workshop : From Theory to Practice

11\. MYP Projects and EE

12\. MYP Service and Action CAS

13\. MYP Interdisciplinary Unit

14\. DP Theory of Knowledge

15-16. Workshop: From Theory to Practice

17\. IB School Visit

18\. Final Presentation
